official_title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to include services of licensed (registered) nurses, physician extenders, and nurse practitioners among the services for which payment may be made under the medicare and medicaid programs.

summary.text: Amends titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to include the services of licensed registered nurses, physician extenders, and nurse practitioners among the services for which payment may be made under such titles.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to include services of licensed (registered) nurses, physician extenders, and nurse practitioners among the services for which payment may be made under the medicare and medicaid programs.
